Field.ElementNote: Enter the date the local study team and/or site PI became aware of the deviation. Conditionality Rule: Condition is for use in multi-site trials, or when multiple teams may be involved in the conduct of a trial.
Enter the date on which the protocol deviation occurred.
Enter a description of the protocol deviation including reasons and contributing factors.

concomitant_medications,Concomitant Medications
